109.title: Announcement
109.content:
Course Introduction

Welcome to the course! This semester we'll be covering advanced topics in computer science.

Please make sure to review the syllabus and course materials before our first lecture.
109.author: Mark

109.title: Announcement
109.content:
Assignment Updates

Important update regarding our upcoming assignments:

  • Assignment #1 due date extended to September 20
  • Assignment #2 requirements updated - please check the course portal

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out during office hours.
109.author: Mark

109.title: Announcement
109.content:
Guest Speaker Next Week

We're excited to announce that next week's lecture will feature a special guest speaker from the industry.

Our guest will be discussing real-world applications of the concepts we've been learning in class.

Don't miss this valuable opportunity to gain insights from an industry expert!
